name: Sumedha
techstacks: Typescript (NodeJS), Express, React (JavaScript), PostgresSQL, Prisma (ORM), Docker, Tensorflow, PoseNet, Jest, Github Action (CI/CD), Sentry
description: Finalist project under Smart India Hackathon 2022.
Developed a modular monolithic service-based MVC architecture with a docker-run postgres database instance.
Dockerized the API using docker-compose to speed up the development processes on different OS, and to help the production version distribute quickly as per the load requirements.
Used Prisma as an ORM to generate migrations, querying & deploying the database, improving the query response time, and maintaining an admin dashboard.
Two separate platforms have been created so that children will only have access to a few resources that will benefit them.
In-app profile: To keep the application safe and child protected, an in-app feature has been induced which will keep kids from using their parents' mail id for any other activity outside the app.
The project is built as a PWA with the enabled capacity of AI-guided yoga powered by tensorflow and posenet.

name: Cube NPM Package
techstacks: Typescript, NodeJS, Jest, Shell, Github Action (CI/CD)
description: Cube Package takes your markdown and parses it into HTML. It can be plugged with any JS/TS framework and helps you in parsing markdown as String, HTMLDivElement, and Blob
Consistency across imports - Use it with commonjs or module, it works with both!
Typescript support - Shipping the Typescript types used in the package to help maintain the consistency around the codebase
Smaller bundle size - Since only distribution files are exported, the bundle size is optimised for all the use-cases.
Source Maps - The distribution version of Cube Package also contains source maps for efficient debugging.
0 Dependencies - Having no dependencies makes cube package a great choice for developers who care about getting work done with speed!

name: Flash Generate
techstacks: Node.js, Typescript, React, Webpack, Babel, Webpack & Babel Plugins
description: Just like Create-React-App, Flash is a beginner-friendly template generator for React applications.
Flash covers all the major things required in a React application along with optimized build (production and development) times and efficient debugging using source maps.
JavaScript chunks, minifying source files, and removing unnecessary dependencies.
Made use of Yarn (over NPM), and a pre-generated lock-file to save time taken in linking the dependencies and thus, reducing the overall installation time.
Made use of hot-reloading and source maps to elevate the debugging process for both production and the development environment.

name: Break
description: Break is an online-code-executor (sandbox environment) where users can not only run their code online but also save it for later. It currently supports all the major programming languages including C, C++, Java, Python, and JavaScript.
Break makes use of React to facilitate the frontend of the application, Node & Express as the backend, and MongoDB as the database.
Migrated the backend from a monolithic to a microservice-based architecture where each module is a completely different API working towards solving a particular problem.
Implemented a JWT-based user-authentication system. Additionally, secured all the API routes using the same JWT-verification middleware.
Indexed the database collections around userID, and codeID respectively for facilitating a faster query response.

name: Easify
techstacks: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, CoachkroachDB, YouTube API, MorphCast SDK
description: Eaisfy is a Chrome Extension to track and enhance developer productivity.

Features include – Emotion Detection, emotion-based music powered by YouTube API and CockroachDB, attention tracker graph, pose estimation, frequent break reminders, and a website blocker to block distractive websites
Classification is done in the browser that ensures the security of user's data
Easify is capable of working in the background thus have an uptime of 24/7.

name: Infinity-Skncure
techstacks: Angular, Typescript, JavaScript, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform (Google APIs), ML5, p5
description: Infinity Skncure is one of the top 50 global projects selected by Google under the Google Solution Challenge 2021.
It is web-based(PWA) skin disease predictor that can predict over 10 skin diseases and can even suggest skin doctors in the proximity.

Features include – Disease detection using images, real-time disease detection, appointment scheduling, skin health tracker, nearby dermatologists on an in-app Google Map, and a community section to post pictures and text in both public and private mode.

name: Summarizer Command-Line Tool
description: It is an interactive command-line interface tool to help you summarize exhaustive texts into smaller ones using text-analysis and Natural Language Processing.
Users can simply locate the file containing the text that is to be summarized from the command line and print the result anywhere in their machines.

name: Event Registration System
description: This website is aimed to reduce the dependency of the college club on third-party resources to book tickets for the events. This project makes use of  Google's Firebase to server backend as a service.
We've enabled this project to create dynamic events along with dynamic forms, and store the data of participants safely that can be retained in the form of .xls(excel) file.

name: Cowin Availability
description: A website built using Node, Express, and EJS, that shows the availability of the COVID-19 vaccine based on the user's area code.

name: Avengers VS Code Extension
description: This extension comes packed with 6 VS Code themes inspried by the colors of Marvel superheroes. It is a one-strop solution to save the user form downloading various scattered themes available on VSCode Marketplace.
This extension has crossed over 1350 installations on VS Code.
